ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Case_Record_Type__c = 'Technical Issue', OR( ISBLANK(Resolution__c) , ISBLANK(Resolution_Tool__c), ISBLANK(Resolution_Comments__c) ) , OR( ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Done') , ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Tech Issue-SR Assigned') , ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Propose to Close')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed as Duplicate')), $User.Id !='005300000042rPL', $User.Id !='005a0000007vvzm', $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'API DATA LOAD')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Enter values for 'Resolution', 'Resolution Summary' and 'Resolution Tool'
